medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain and discomfort associated with constipation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Bowel difficulties began in early childhood, diminished during teenage years, but recurred in her 20s. Over the past 2.5 years, constipation and associated symptoms have worsened, with frequent abdominal pain, bloating, a feeling of fullness, and straining during bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of osteoporosis (T score -3.2), Raynaud phenomena, and a benign left ovarian cyst removal in the 1970s.
medical_history.family_history: Significant family history includes a grandfather with rectal cancer and an aunt with breast cancer.
medical_history.social_history: Lives with her husband, has 2 grown children, works as a professional, began exercising regularly about a year ago, drinks alcohol socially, and does not use nonprescription drugs.
